code:
flowchart LR
    %% Pipeline
    I[Input Tokens] --> E[Token/Positional Embeddings]
    E --> TB1[Transformer Block 1]
    TB1 --> TB2[Transformer Block 2]
    TB2 -->|activations/keys/values| BML([Blur Memory Layer])
    BML --> TB3[Transformer Block 3+]
    TB3 --> O[Output logits / tokens]

    %% Blur internals
    subgraph S1[Blur Memory Layer (BML)]
        A1[Sample activations] --> A2[Density/graph clustering]
        A2 --> A3[Compute cluster centroids (μ)]
        A3 --> A4[Reweight updates toward centroids]
        A2 -.->|novelty| A5{New cluster?}
        A5 -- yes --> A6[Create Blur]
        A5 -- no --> A7[Assimilate into existing Blur]
    end

    %% Persistent graph
    BML -.writes/reads.-> BGD[(Blur Graph DB)]
    BGD -.->|edges: similarity, co-use, temporal| BML

    %% Hierarchy
    subgraph H[Blur Hierarchy]
      B1((Blur α)):::blur --- B2((Blur β)):::blur
      B2 --- B3((Blur γ)):::blur
      B1 -. meta-links .- MB([Meta-Blur: higher abstraction]):::meta
    end

    classDef blur fill:#E8F3FF,stroke:#2F6FED,stroke-width:1.2px
    classDef meta fill:#FFF4D6,stroke:#DFA500,stroke-width:1.2px
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
